page.title: 13BEECHWOOD CRICKET CLUB
page.content: Beechwood Cricket Club is the village team for Monkswood.We play on a ground behind the Beaufort Arms Pub.The ground is rented from the Courage Brewery with money being raised from subscriptions, match levies and social functions. The members, approximately 40 in number, live within a radius of twenty miles from the ground. Anyone can join, unemployed and junior members paying half the subscription fees and half price for teas. The ground is maintained by members working a monthly rota.Completing the rota makes the member eligible to play in a match.Two teams are fielded to play a Saturday league,friendly matches and several knockout competitions.During the winter months an indoor league is played at Caldicot Leisure Centre.
